EmailTemplate.description: ODE - Send "Application Update Submitted" notification to Assigned specialist
EmailTemplate.name: ODE Application Update Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Application for Licensure Update Submitted for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c} {!CLQ_Role__c.CLQ_Program_name_Formula__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c} {!CLQ_Role__c.CLQ_Program_Number_Formula__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You have successfully submitted an update to your application for licensure for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c} {!CLQ_Role__c.CLQ_Program_name_Formula__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c} {!CLQ_Role__c.CLQ_Program_Number_Formula__c}. A copy of the updated application is attached to this email.
The Licensing Online Team
This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
ref: {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.Id}
